name: Sniffer Dogg
description:
Sniff out the treasures and dig them out!

Control with WASD, sniff with F and dig with E.

Press ESC to Pause.

Thanks and credit to Rick Lazer for the soundtrack!

Unfortunally there's a big warp/movement bug. We'd be happy if someone might know a fix.

Enjoy anyway!

Game was developed for the second GDevelop Game Jam.
